A basic input box.back:
<!-- A basic input -->
<input type="text" name="input" value="Type here">

radio buttons.back:
Male
Female

checkboxes.back:
I have a bike
I have a car

simple form with submit button.back:
<!-- Simple form which will send a GET request -->
<form action="">
	<label for="GET-name">Name:</label>
	<input id="GET-name" type="text" name="name">
	<input type="submit" value="Save">
</form>

<!-- Simple form which will send a POST request -->
<form action="" method="post">
	<label for="POST-name">Name:</label>
	<input id="POST-name" type="text" name="name">
	<input type="submit" value="Save">
</form>

drop-down list.back:
<!-- The second value will be selected initially -->
<select name="select">
	<option value="value1">Value 1</option>
	<option value="value2" selected>Value 2</option>
	<option value="value3">Value 3</option>
</select>

label with for attribute.back:
<!-- Simple label example with for attribute -->
<label for="Name">Click me</label>
<input type="text" id="Name" name="Name" />

<!-- or more simply -->
<label>Click me <input type="text" id="Name" name="Name" /></label>
